name: Command R+
description: Command R+ is Cohere's most powerful model, optimized for complex reasoning, creative generation, and factual responses. Best for enterprise applications requiring high-quality outputs.
comments: Cohere's flagship model for high-stakes enterprise applications.

name: Command R
description: Command R balances performance and efficiency. Strong reasoning capabilities with improved factuality and instruction-following. Suitable for most enterprise use cases.
comments: Versatile model for most production applications.

name: Command Light
description: Command Light is Cohere's most efficient model, optimized for speed and cost. Designed for simpler tasks and high-throughput applications where efficiency is paramount.
comments: Fast and cost-effective for simple tasks and high volume applications.

name: Command
description: The original Command model, offering good general-purpose text generation capabilities. Has been largely superseded by Command R for most use cases.
comments: Legacy model, recommended to upgrade to Command R.

name: Embed English v3.0
description: Cohere's latest English language embedding model. Transforms text into high-quality vector representations for search, recommendations, and classification tasks.
comments: State-of-the-art English embeddings for semantic search and retrieval.

name: Embed Multilingual v3.0
description: Cohere's multilingual embedding model supporting 100+ languages. Creates consistent vector representations across languages for global applications.
comments: Best choice for multilingual semantic applications.

name: Rerank English v3.0
description: Rerank is designed to improve search quality by reordering results based on relevance to a query. Optimized for English language search applications.
comments: Specialized model for improving search result quality.

name: Rerank Multilingual v3.0
description: Multilingual version of Rerank supporting 100+ languages. Reorders search results based on relevance across language boundaries.
comments: Best for global search applications across multiple languages.
